title: Launching Onex Mainnet as a new consumer chain to Onomy
description:
# Launching Onex as a consumer chain

This is the proposal to launch the Onex consumer chain, "onex-mainnet-1", after the successful launch of onex-testnet-5.

Please visit the [onomyprotocol/onex](https://github.com/onomyprotocol/onex/tree/main/chain/onex-mainnet-1) repo for additional details.
